front.title: Signaling Protocol to convey FEC Framework Configuration Information

abstract.t: FEC Framework document [FECARCH] defines the FEC Framework Configuration Information necessary for the FEC framework operation. This document describes one signaling protocol to determine and communicate the Configuration information between sender(s) and receiver(s). Conventions used in this document In examples, "C:" and "S:" indicate lines sent by the client and server respectively. The key words "MUST", "MUST NOT", "REQUIRED", "SHALL", "SHALL NOT", "SHOULD", "SHOULD NOT", "RECOMMENDED", "MAY", and "OPTIONAL" in this document are to be interpreted as described in [RFC2119].
